title: DeepSPV: An Interpretable Deep Learning Pipeline for 3D Spleen Volume Estimation from 2D Ultrasound Images
details: Z Yuan, D Stojanovski, L Li, A Gomez, H Jogeesvaran… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Splenomegaly, the enlargement of the spleen, is an important clinical indicator for various associated medical conditions, such as sickle cell disease (SCD). Spleen length measured from 2D ultrasound is the most widely used metric for …
